page.title: 08Cheriton Fitzpaine Clubs
page.content: There are clubs for all ages from toddlers to grandparents.In the village hall a playgroup is held on Mon,Tue & Thur.Mrs Hazelhurst runs the Church's{Thursday Club}at her house for children:there is Sunday school as well.{Brownies,Cubs and Guides}are held once a week as is the {Barella {Dancers.}For older children there is a {Youth Club}and for over 15year olds,a {Young Farmers Club. }For older people a {Bible Study}group meet once a week.There are 2 WI Groups, Mothers Union, 2 darts teams at the Half Moon & 4{skittle Teams}at the Ring o'Bells. Other clubs in the village are Domino Club, Whist Drives, Horticultural Club and Football and Cricket.Ad Hoc singing group and Drama group give regular performances and the{twinning {with Bonnebosq,Calvados}is very successful.
